63 class StateModel
64 {
65 public:
66 
67  typedef const Thermodynamics& ARGS;
68 
70  static std::string typeName() { return "StateModel"; }
71 
79  StateModel(ARGS thermo, const int nenergy, const int nmass)
80  : m_thermo(thermo), m_nenergy(nenergy), m_nmass(nmass)
81  {
82  m_T = m_Tr = m_Tv = m_Tel = m_Te = 300.0;
83  m_P = 0.0;
84  mp_X = new double [m_thermo.nSpecies()];
85  for (int i = 0; i < thermo.nSpecies(); ++i)
86  mp_X[i] = 0.0;
87  }
88 
92  virtual ~StateModel()
93  {
94  // Delete data pointers
95  delete [] mp_X;
96 
97  // Delete transfer models
98  for (int i = 0; i < m_transfer_models.size(); ++i)
99  delete m_transfer_models[i].second;
100  }
101 
105  inline int nEnergyEqns() const { return m_nenergy; }
106 
110  inline int nMassEqns() const { return m_nmass; }
111 
121  virtual void setState(
122  const double* const p_mass, const double* const p_energy,
123  const int vars = 0) = 0;
124 
128  void setBField(const double B) {
129  m_B = B;
130  }
131 
135  double getBField() const {
136  return m_B;
137  }
138 
142  inline double T() const {
143  return m_T;
144  }
145 
149  inline double Tv() const {
150  return m_Tv;
151  }
152 
156  inline double Te() const {
157  return m_Te;
158  }
159 
163  inline double Tr() const {
164  return m_Tr;
165  }
166 
170  inline double Tel() const {
171  return m_Tel;
172  }
173 
177  inline double P() const {
178  return m_P;
179  }
180 
190  void equilibrate(double T, double P, double* const p_Xe = NULL)
191  {
192  // Compute the equilibrium composition
193  if (p_Xe == NULL)
194  m_thermo.equilSolver()->equilibrate(
195  T, P, m_thermo.getDefaultComposition(), mp_X);
196  else
197  m_thermo.equilSolver()->equilibrate(T, P, p_Xe, mp_X);
198 
199  // Set the temperature and pressure
200  m_T = m_Te = m_Tr = m_Tv = m_Tel = T;
201  m_P = P;
202  }
203 
207  virtual void getTemperatures(double* const p_T) const {
208  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getTemperatures()");
209  }
210 
216  virtual void getEnergiesMass(double* const p_e) {
217  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getEnergiesMass()");
218  }
219 
225  virtual void getEnthalpiesMass(double* const p_h) {
226  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getEnthalpiesMass()");
227  }

235  virtual void getCpsMass(double* const p_Cp){
236  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getCpsMass()");
237  }

246  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getCvsMass()");
247  }
248 
252  virtual void getTagModes(int* const p_tag) {
253  throw NotImplementedError("StateModel::getTagModes()");
254  }
255 
259  inline const double* const X() const {
260  return mp_X;
261  }
262 
266  virtual void initializeTransferModel(Mutation::Mixture& mix) {}
267 
274  virtual void energyTransferSource(double* const p_omega)
275  {
276  for (int i = 0; i < m_nenergy-1; ++i)
277  p_omega[i] = 0.0;
278 
279  for (int i = 0; i < m_transfer_models.size(); ++i)
280  p_omega[m_transfer_models[i].first] +=
281  m_transfer_models[i].second->source();
282  }
283 
284 protected:
290  void addTransferTerm(int i, Mutation::Transfer::TransferModel* p_term)
291  {
292  assert(i >= 0);
293  assert(i < m_nenergy-1);
294  m_transfer_models.push_back(std::make_pair(i, p_term));
295  }
296 
325  template <typename CpProvider, typename HProvider>
326  bool getTFromRhoE(
327  const CpProvider& cp,
328  const HProvider& h,
329  const double rhoe,
330  double& T,
331  double* const p_work,
332  const double alpha = 0.0,
333  const double atol = 1.0e-12,
334  const double rtol = 1.0e-12,
335  const int max_iters = 100)
336  {
337  using std::cerr;
338  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
339  const double rhoe_over_Ru = rhoe/RU;
340  const double tol = rtol*std::abs(rhoe_over_Ru) + atol;
341 
342  double f, fp, dT;
343 
344  // Compute initial value of f
345  h(T, p_work);
346  f = alpha;
347  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
348  f += mp_X[i]*p_work[i];
349  f = T*f - rhoe_over_Ru;
350 
351  int iter = 0;
352  //cout << iter << " " << f << " " << T << endl;
353  while (std::abs(f) > tol) {
354  // Check for max iterations
355  if (iter++ == max_iters) {
356  std::cerr << "Exceeded max iterations when computing temperature!\n";
357  std::cerr << "res = " << f / rhoe_over_Ru << ", T = " << T << std::endl;
358  return false;
359  }
360 
361  // Compute df/dT
362  cp(T, p_work);
363  fp = alpha;
364  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
365  fp += mp_X[i]*p_work[i];
366 
367  // Update T
368  dT = f/fp;
369  if (std::abs(T - 50.0) < 1.0e-10 && dT > 0) {
370  std::cerr << "Clamping T at 50 K, energy is too low for the "
371  << "given species densities..." << std::endl;
372  return false;
373  }
374  while (T - dT < 50.0) dT *= 0.5; // prevent non-positive T
375  T -= dT;
376 
377  // Recompute f
378  h(T, p_work);
379  f = alpha;
380  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
381  f += mp_X[i]*p_work[i];
382  f = T*f - rhoe_over_Ru;
383  //cout << iter << " " << f << " " << T << endl;
384  }
385 
386  // Let the user know if we converged or not
387  return true;
388  }
389 
390 protected:
391 
392  const Thermodynamics& m_thermo;
393  const int m_nenergy;
394  const int m_nmass;
395 
396  double m_T;
397  double m_Tv;
398  double m_Tr;
399  double m_Tel;
400  double m_Te;
401  double m_P;
402  double m_B;
403 
404  double* mp_X;
405 
406 
407  std::vector< std::pair<int, Mutation::Transfer::TransferModel*> >
408  m_transfer_models;
409 private:
410 
411 
412 }; // class StateModel
413

416  } // namespace Thermodynamics
417 } // namespace Mutation
